title: Shia LaBeouf shaves his head for 'American Honey'
content:
By ANI | ANI  –  
London, Sept 5(ANI): Shia LaBeouf is getting in the character as he has undergone a major transformation for his upcoming flick 'American Honey.' 
 
The 29-year-old actor, who has been seen sporting a full beard and mullet for the last few months, was recently spotted with a completely shaved head and fuzz-free face, reports The Mirror. 
 
Along with his new look, the 'Fury' star has also got some new art work on his body which he showed off after hitting the gym in West Hollywood. (ANI)^
